name: Atlantis Fitness Center
description: The Atlantis Fitness Center offers a full complement of Precor Techno Gym equipment with Active Wellness TVs — the same equipment used by Olympic athletes in the 2000, 2004, and 2008 games. Cardio theater access is included for all hotel guests, and complimentary infused water created by the in-house master mixologist enhances your workout recovery.
shortDescription: Olympic-grade Precor Techno Gym equipment included free for all Atlantis hotel guests.

faqs.question: Is the fitness center free for Atlantis guests?
faqs.answer: Yes — cardio theater and fitness center access is complimentary for all hotel guests and with any spa service or day pass.

faqs.question: What equipment is available?
faqs.answer: Full Precor Techno Gym equipment with Active Wellness TVs — the same used by Olympic athletes at the 2000, 2004, and 2008 games.

testimonials.quote: Best hotel gym I've used. The Precor equipment is top-tier and being free for guests is a huge bonus on a golf trip.
testimonials.author: Tom B.

testimonials.quote: Great way to warm up before a round or recover after 18 holes. Clean, well-maintained, and never too crowded.
testimonials.author: Lisa P.
